messages.subject: Greetings All
messages.msgSnippet: Konnichiwa, I have just joined this list and wished to express my greetings to all of you. I am very interested in Japanese history and have visited Japan
messages.messageBody:
Konnichiwa,

I have just joined this list and wished to express my greetings to all
of you. I am very interested in Japanese history and have visited Japan
twice. I know a little history, but I want to learn more, much much more. I
am hoping that being a member of this list will broaden my knowledge. I have
visited the Samurai Archives web page very frequently in the past and have
just stumbled onto this e-mail group. I hope to meet new people with whom I
can talk about Japan and it's history.

Compassion go with you,

~Sasaki Kojiro~
(AKA: JJ)
